@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW 2/10 The math, concept, and code involved in #Decred #Privacy are all straightforward and well-understood.  * Requires only hundreds of lines of code for the core logic, compared to thousands or tens of thousands for other privacy implementations. Less code means less to break.

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW 3/10 Other approaches are not prunable→not conducive to long-term store of value  * #Decred #Privacy initial release creates user anonymity, plans to add confidential transaction amounts * Auditable on-chain to ensure against stealth inflation

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW @real_or_random @pedrorechez @aniketpkate 6/10 How #Decred #Privacy Works  * Non-custodial process creates Coinjoin txs: output addresses are anonymized via mixnet * Mix occurs within epochs, handles both transaction amounts and change * Much occurs off-chain, maintaining scalability and avoiding chain bloat  https://t.co/qahBmuRCvM

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW @real_or_random @pedrorechez @aniketpkate 8/10 The implementation of CT (bulletproofs) to hide transaction amounts requires changes to consensus rules. As such, #decred stakeholders will vote on a proposal to determine the future, no contentious hard forks required.

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW @real_or_random @pedrorechez @aniketpkate 9/10 #Decred is built on solid foundations to be a superior long term store of value:  * Hypersecure ledger 20X more costly to attack than PoW alone * Adaptable to evolve formally per the direction of the community * Sustainable-project treasury continually funded by block reward

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW 4/10 #Decred #Privacy is based on CoinShuffle ++ via @real_or_random @pedrorechez @aniketpkate  * Creatively leverages Decred’s governance system to help fill the mixer * Inclusively allows stakers and non-stakers to opt-in * Uses simple code, proven cryptography

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW @real_or_random @pedrorechez @aniketpkate 5/10 #decred #privacy Next Steps  * Wallet & GUI integration * Voting Service Provider (VSP) changes to enable user opt-in * Mixer server clustering, or integration into dcrd * Confidential Transactions (Bulletproofs) to hide transaction amounts * Stakeholders vote on proposals

@monero @ElectricCoinCo @beamprivacy @grinMW @real_or_random @pedrorechez @aniketpkate 7/10 #Decred #Privacy can be made post-quantum secure to ensure the mixing process is not vulnerable to adversaries with quantum computers. The key exchange process would need to be modified to allow for use of post-quantum PKI systems.
